title: Genesis Chapter 50 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 50 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Joseph do in Genesis 50:2?
options: Called upon the name of the Lord
Built an altar to the Lord
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:2 states: "And Joseph commanded his servants the physicians to embalm his father: and the physicians embalmed Israel."

questions.question: According to Genesis 50:2, who commanded his servants the physicians to embalm his father?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:2 states: "And Joseph commanded his servants the physicians to embalm his father: and the physicians embalmed Israel."

questions.question: Who said "Go up, and bury thy father, according as he made thee swear" in Genesis 50:6?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:6 states: "And Pharaoh said, Go up, and bury thy father, according as he made thee swear."

questions.question: According to Genesis 50:7, who went up to bury his father?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:7 states: "And Joseph went up to bury his father: and with him went up all the servants of Pharaoh, the elders of his house, and..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 50:19, who said unto them?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:19 states: "And Joseph said unto them, Fear not: for am I in the place of God?"

questions.question: Who said "unto them, Fear not: for am I in the place of God?" in Genesis 50:19?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:19 states: "And Joseph said unto them, Fear not: for am I in the place of God?"

questions.question: According to Genesis 50:24, who said unto his brethren?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:24 states: "And Joseph said unto his brethren, I die: and God will surely visit you, and bring you out of this land unto the land..."

questions.question: Who said "unto his brethren, I die: and God will surely visit you, and bring you out of..." in Genesis 50:24?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:24 states: "And Joseph said unto his brethren, I die: and God will surely visit you, and bring you out of this land unto the land..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 50:25, who took an oath of the children of Israel?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:25 states: "And Joseph took an oath of the children of Israel, saying, God will surely visit you, and ye shall carry up my bones ..."

questions.question: Who said "God will surely visit you, and ye shall carry up my bones from hence" in Genesis 50:25?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:25 states: "And Joseph took an oath of the children of Israel, saying, God will surely visit you, and ye shall carry up my bones ..."

questions.question: What location is mentioned in Genesis 50:5?
questions.explanation: Genesis 50:5 states: "My father made me swear, saying, Lo, I die: in my grave which I have digged for me in the land of Canaan, there shalt..."

questions.question: In Genesis 50:14, Isaac went up with him to bury his father.
questions.explanation: This is false. It was Joseph, not Isaac, who went up with him to bury his father. Genesis 50:14 states: "And Joseph returned into Egypt, he, and his brethren, and all that went up with him to bury his f..."

questions.question: The events of Genesis 50:22 take place in Nazareth.
questions.explanation: This is false. The verse mentions Egypt, not Nazareth. Genesis 50:22 states: "And Joseph dwelt in Egypt, he, and his father's house: and Joseph lived an hundred and ten years."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 50:1: "And ______ fell upon his father's face, and wept upon him, and kissed him."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Joseph fell upon his father's face, and wept upon him, and kissed him."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 50:3: "And ______ days were fulfilled for him; for so are fulfilled the days of those which are embalmed: and the Egyptians mourned for him threescore and..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And forty days were fulfilled for him; for so are fulfilled the days of those which are embalmed: and the Egyptians m..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 50:4: "And when the days of his mourning were past, Joseph spake unto the house of ______, saying, If now I have found grace in your eyes, speak, I pray y..."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And when the days of his mourning were past, Joseph spake unto the house of Pharaoh, saying, If now I have found grac..."
